product_name: Partners West Day Hikes and Overnights on the Pacific Crest Trail: Southern California
long_description: Day Hikes and Overnight on the Pacific Crest Trail: Southern California offers hikes and overnight trips on sections of the Pacific Crest Trail from the Mexican border to Los Angeles County.
short_description: Day Hikes and Overnight on the Pacific Crest Trail: Southern California offers hikes and overnight trips on sections of the Pacific Crest Trail from the Mexican border to Los Angeles County.
